item.title: DNA pioneer James Watson dies at 97
item.description: The Nobel Prize winner felt ostracised by the scientific community over his comments on race and intelligence.

item.title: Ugandans welcome war crimes charges against LRA leader Joseph Kony and demand his arrest
item.description: The warlord remains at large but victims hope the ICC charges will renew efforts to capture him.

item.title: British ex-soldier arrested over alleged murder of Kenyan woman in 2012
item.description: Robert James Purkiss faces extradition over allegations he murdered Agnes Manjiru.

item.title: EU forces free crew after Somali pirate attack on tanker
item.description: The Hellas Aphrodite crew have been freed from armed Somali pirates who seized it the previous day.

item.title: France advises citizens to leave Mali urgently amid jihadist fuel blockade
item.description: The blockade, imposed by jihadists, has upended daily life in the landlocked nation.
